reviewText: I enjoy watching this movie for the first time.

The movie centers on a child (who is an orphan). He is attempting to survive in a harsh world. He finds a couple more kids who help each other. Theres plenty of fighting and I found the movie entertaining.
I saw this when I was little younger - thoroughly enjoyed back then as well as now.

i never believed i would find this movie after all these years and it's just as i remembered it. non-digitally enhanced (just the way i wanted it) and still action-packed. i understand more of the storyline now and it just makes it all the more enjoyable now. so thank you, ever so much, for bringing this classic back into my hands, and heart! KUNG-FU KIDS [...]
